mapper.insert: insert into study_plan(name, c_id, user_id, time, content) VALUES (#{name}, #{courseId}, #{userId}, #{time}, #{content})
mapper.update:
update study_plan
name = #{name},
c_id = #{courseId},
user_id = #{userId},
time = #{time},
content = #{content},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select sp.id, sp.c_id courseId, c.course_name courseName, sp.user_id, ui.name userName, time, sp.content, sp.name from study_plan sp left join course c on c.id = sp.c_id left join user_info ui on ui.id = sp.user_id
